name: Shivani Ji
greetingText: 💖 I just have to say, your name is as beautiful as you are, and every time I say it, it feels like a melody to my heart! ✨💕
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday, 🎉❤️ Yeee! 🥳✨ Wishing you endless joy, love, and laughter today and always.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
